channel.title: 64 Bit Operating System
channel.description: Recent content on 64 Bit Operating System

item.title: Description
item.description: Description : 64 Bit Operating System : We are making a 64 bit Operating System from the scratch . In this assignment we will make x86 compatible Operating System that is multi boot 2 and then on later on stage ( In Task 2 ) we will expand it to other architecture. This Operating System is primarily written in a C and C++ programming language ( Mingw64 is installed to run these ) but we also used assembly language in some part of our code where we need hardware specific coding.

item.title: My Profile
item.description: Name : Zainab Ghauri Cms Id : 296357 Class : BS-CS ( 9-A ) CAO-Assignment : (1+2+3) Description : I am a CS student at SEECS, NUST . Currently , i am in sophomore year and my current Cgpa is 3.66/4.0 . I am a hard working and a determined person. Also I haven’t done any internship yet but i did two courses from coursera this lockdown , one is Google-IT and the other Basics of Web devolpment Accounts : 1.
